Package com.exedio.cope

Class RangeViolationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.exedio.cope.ConstraintViolationException
            • com.exedio.cope.RangeViolationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleRangeViolationException, IntegerRangeViolationException, LongRangeViolationException
    public abstract class RangeViolationException
extends ConstraintViolationException
    Signals, that an attempt to write an FunctionField has been failed, because the value to be written violated the range constraint on that field. This exception will be thrown by FunctionField.set(Item,Object) and item constructors.
    Author:
    Ralf Wiebicke
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Creates a new RangeViolationException with the necessary information about the violation.
